bsb.content: And God saw that the light was good, and He separated the light from the darkness.

macula.content: וַיַּ֧רְא אֱלֹהִ֛ים אֶת־ הָא֖וֹר כִּי־ ט֑וֹב וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל אֱלֹהִ֔ים בֵּ֥ין הָא֖וֹר וּבֵ֥ין הַחֹֽשֶׁךְ׃

target.content: God i lukim lait i gutpela, na em i amamas. Na em i brukim tudak na tulait.

alt: God see light is good, and him is amazing. And him break darkness and separate light.

alignment.Target phrase: Na em i brukim tudak na tulait.
alignment.Pseudo-English phrase: And him break darkness and separate light.

bsb.content: Then God said, “Let the earth bring forth vegetation: seed-bearing plants and fruit trees, each bearing fruit with seed according to its kind.” And it was so.

macula.content: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר  אֱלֹהִ֗ים  תַּֽדְשֵׁ֤א  הָאָ֨רֶץ֙  דֶּ֔שֶׁא  עֵ֚שֶׂב  מַזְרִ֣יעַ  זֶ֔רַע  עֵ֣ץ  פְּרִ֞י  עֹ֤שֶׂה  פְּרִי֙  לְמִינ֔וֹ  אֲשֶׁ֥ר  זַרְעוֹ־ ב֖וֹ  עַל־ הָאָ֑רֶץ  וַֽיְהִי־ כֵֽן׃

target.content: Entonces ʼElohim dijo: Produzca la tierra vegetación: hierba que haga germinar semilla y árbol frutal que dé fruto sobre la tierra según su especie, cuya semilla esté en él. Y fue así.

alignments.Spanish phrase: y árbol frutal que dé fruto sobre la tierra
alignments.English phrase: "and fruit trees, each bearing fruit with seed according to its kind."
